title: Kassadin Void Walking Out of Fizz Ult
body:
I was playing a game as {{champion:105}} today on Summoners Rift in a Normal 5v5 getting ready for the Ocean Week, and I was against a {{champion:38}} , and somehow he was **Void Walk**ing out of **Chum in the Waters**, I'm just curious whether this is a bug or something, as a mate of mine plays {{champion:38}} and he says that it shouldn't be possible.
Does anyone have feedback about whether this is a bug or not?

replies.body:
What part of it is he avoiding? Off the top of my head he's either dodging the missile at the last second, moving as the shark comes up, or dodging the knockup and still taking the damage.

It seems unlikely that his ult is cleansing the chum in the water off him.
